TutorialPart1End.message:
Great job!
You completed the puzzle.

SpaceToInteract.message:
Press SPACE to pick up/drop
puzzle pieces, order matters!

WatchOutForEnemies.message:
Watch out for enemies! Use your mouse to aim
your gun at them. Once the puzzle is completed,
they'll stop spawning.

TookTooMuchDamage.message:
Oh no, you took too much damage!
 Click your mouse to try again.

TutorialPart2End.message: Excellent! You're ready to go on a real mission.
